Help

This section contains information about the actively registered vendors in your credentialing program. This information can be filtered from within the table to find the specific vendor(s) that you are looking for.

Help

This section allows you to determine which vendors have the ability to request appointments. All vendors are defaulted to allow them to make an appointment. If you wish to restrict particular reps from making an appointment, proceed to 'Manage Rep Permissions.'
